title: Harden Goes Undertaker, a Wide-Open West, Tatumâ€™s Biggest Test, and More NBA Overreactions With Ryen Russillo
description:
The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo to discuss the 76ers' Game 4 win over the Heat (3:14), why Bill thinks Suns-Mavericks is a closer series than it seems (24:08), the Warriors going up 2-1 over the Grizzlies (42:21), the Bucks stealing Game 3 from the Celtics (1:05:17), and more!

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Ryen Russillo
Producer: Kyle Crichton
